block.para: Use &REKlong; to detect faces, objects, and people in videos by starting asynchronous detection jobs. This example also configures &REK; to notify an &SNSlong; (&SNS;) topic when jobs complete and subscribes an &SQSlong; (&SQS;) queue to the topic. When the queue receives a message about a job, the job is retrieved and the results are output.
This example is best viewed on GitHub. For complete source code and instructions on how to set up and run, see the full example on GitHub.
